capabilities.description: Piwigo is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Piwigo is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Piwigo is able bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Piwigo requires this ability to bind to port 80 within the container.
capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE

capabilities.description: Piwigo is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Piwigo is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

1.1.1.readme:
Piwigo

Piwigo is a photo gallery software for the web that comes with powerful features to publish and manage your collection of pictures.
